name: Squire Series
description: Stoic and rooted to the soil, Adepts of the Squire Series excell in leadership and versatility.

name: Miko Series
description: Miko are trained to express astronomic power by funneling their inner spirits.

name: Guard Series
description: In the heat of the battle, the Guards will heroically protect their own.

name: Flame User Series
description: Flame Users show the glistering magic of the Mars element, by reigning Justice from above

name: Pirate Series
description: Crossing and plundering throughout the Eastern Seas, Pirates fear the lands more than the depths below.

name: Wind Seer Series
description: Windseers inherit the wisdom and tempestuousness of the Anemos.

name: Beastling Series
description: Their connection to nature lets Beastlings become one with the wild.

name: Water Seer Series
description: The heirs of the Mercury Clan use the chill of water to heal.

name: Mariner Series
description: Mastering the seas allows Mariners to cross waters even the roughest conditions.

name: Aqua Squire Series
description: The Ayuthay pledge to become reputable representatives of their folk to rise from a mere Aqua Squire to reigning their country. `(Dev-note: Unlike the games, the stats of the Aqua Squire series follow those of the Squire Series, and not the Mariner Series)`

name: Brute Series
description: A Brutes mere interest is to fight and prove superiority.

name: Apprentice Series
description: The study of Alchemy and the answer of the universe is the center of the Apprentices education, with the goal to support all of their fellows.

name: Crusader Series
description: Crusaders are treasure hunters and try to pick up a bargain whenever possible.

name: Page Series
description: The Pages study the strategies and abilities of their peers, so they may better support them.

name: Air Pilgrim Series
description: The Air Pilgrims don't have a home. They travel from place to place with the winds.

name: Aqua Pilgrim Series
description: On their journeys through all sorts of terrains, Aqua Pilgrims leave riddled markings to mark their way.

name: Air Seer Series
description: Air Seers meditate in Canyons, to make predictions about the future.

name: Hermit Series
description: Hermits stay at one place to find their inner peace.

name: Aqua Seer Series
description: The energy of swamps lets Aqua Seers anticipate future events.

name: Swordsman Series
description: Eager to show their strengths, young Swordsmen hang about in the vicinity of the battle grounds.

name: Curse Mage Series
description: Mikos turn to dark, but powerful curses, when they have lost their way.

name: Scrapper Series
description: Young Scrappers like to tinker with mechanisms, which they try to make the best of in battles.

name: Samurai Series
description: Samurais are trained to have the upper hand in Hand-On-Hand combat.

name: Ninja Series
description: Ninjas are Masters in causing as much destruction as possible.

name: Ranger Series
description: Rangers wander the wilds alone, until they master the true forces of nature.

name: Dragoon Series
description: Dragoons are always surrounded by their companions.

name: White Mage Series
description: The healing capabilites of the White Mages are the best of their kind.

name: Medium Series
description: Mediums talk to the fallen and harness their powers.
